QuestData.Title: Defenders of Daelin's Gate
QuestData.Description:
Daelin's Gate has protected the southern channel for decades. If it falls, the pirate fleet can sail straight into Tiragarde Sound!
The marines at Vigil Hill will need our help. Let's go!
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride with Taelia to Vigil Hill.
QuestData.RewardText: You've come to help? Oh, thank the tides.
